article.headline: The Citadel 79, Webber College  75
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. (AP) -- Dante Terry scored a career-high 33 points to lift The Citadel to a 79-75 victory over Webber on Saturday night. Terry hit two free throws with 23 seconds remaining to give the Bulldogs (0-1) a 76-75 lead, and The Citadel got two crucial steals in the final moments to seal the win. Efrain Jaiman had 20 points and 12 rebounds to lead Webber (0-6), and Ryan Norris added 12 points. Following Terry's free throws, Andy Miller stole the inbounds pass and Max Mombollet hit a pair of free throws. Terry added another free throw after a steal for the game's final margin. The Bulldogs trailed by as many as 10 points until Terry hit a three-pointer with 10:48 in the second half to give The Citadel a 60-58 lead. It was one of his six baskets from behind the arc.
